thread.title: Handy hotel in good location
thread.title_full: Handy hotel in good location - Review of Chiswick Rooms, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: francescaj87
title: Handy hotel in good location
text: This hotel was firstly very easy to get to, being just across the road from Stamford Brook subway station on the district line. The rooms were very small, but if you are looking for a bed for the night this is not really an issue. Hotel was very clean and nicely decorated, and well equipped with everything you would need including shower gel, hairdryer, tv, tea station etc. The main street round the corner has lots of restaurants and shops and this would be an easy place to get to from Heathrow. Would stay again.
